text:
Hi everyone ! I’m very new to HubSpot and I have to develop some integrations with some of our APIs.
I’d like to know if there’s a workaround to replicate some data (like Companies, Contacts and Workflows) in a test environment so that I can test my development without moving anything in our production portal.
I heard that there’s a Sandbox feature in HubSpot Enterprise plan, but my company uses the Pro plan so I can’t use it.
You can create a dev account and use the "Testing" to create a sandbox
